title: The Network Distance Learning System Aided by Computer Information and Online Video Technology
abstract: With the continuous development and progress of computer network technology, big data mining has been vigorously applied in various industries. The informatization of teaching and educational administration is an important part of the informatization of college education. The system designed in this paper adopts a three-tier structure development model to build a curriculum resource and teaching management system based on .NET technology as the core system plan. The article explores the realization of curriculum resources and teaching management platform solutions through WEB technology. The system revolves around the teaching resources and activities involved in the whole process of teacher's course teaching, and realizes the teaching plan, syllabus, teaching schedule, experiment arrangement, learning resources (multimedia resources, courseware, teaching and learning templates and tools, cases, Documents, student work) and other resource information on the Internet publishing, inquiries, browsing and updating. In addition, extracurricular supplementary teaching activities between teachers and students can be carried out through online Q&A, teacher-student exchanges and special discussions.
venue: 2021 IEEE International Conference on Emergency Science and Information Technology (ICESIT)
